entry.title: 100 Songs
entry.summary: 100 bagers of my life, in autobiographical order (Incomplete)
entry.content:
This started as a list of 100 songs that were the track I thought was the best ever, that I would listen to on repeat thinking, this song is the best song ever... until I tired of it. I present them in rough autobiographical order - by which I mean the order, in my life, when I was was so entranced by them.

While some fit that bill entirely, some stand for not a particulary song I used to listen to on repeat, but to an album I was overtaken by.

I also had to add the rule of one band/artist per entry. Otherwise more than half the list would be by two artists.

Here's 100 songs, the songs of my life.

  1. Atirei o pau ao gato
  2. Banda sonora Rei Leao - Eu mal posso esperar para ser Rei
  3. The Connels - 74/75
  4. Rui Veloso - O ourives mestre Joao
  5. Beethoven - 9th Synphony ( Szell - Cleveland Orchestra)
  6. Dulce Pontes - Cancao do mar
  7. Korn - freak on a leash
  8. Candela Azul - Juegalo
  9. Buena Vista Social Club - Chan Chan
  10. Joaquin Rodrigo - Concierto de Aranjuez - Alegro (Paco de Lucia)
  11. Queen - It's a kind of Magic
  12. Atomic kitten - Eternal Flame
  13. Bjork - It's Oh So Quiet
  14. Rage Against the Machine - Killing in the name
  15. The Guitar Trio - Mediterranean Sundance
  16. The Prodigy - Smack my bitch up
  17. Livin' la Vida Loca - Ricky Martin
  18. The Offspring - Come out and play
  19. Fatboy Slim - Right Here, Right Now
  20. Zeca Afonso - Cantar Alentejano
  21. Proppelerheads - Spybreak!
  22. Portishead - Glory Box
  23. Area - L'elefante bianco
  24. Can - Mother Sky
  25. Gong - Flying Teapot
  26. Paco de Lucia - Zyriab
  27. Norah Jones - Don't know why
  28. The Velvet Underground - Venus in Furs
  29. Laurie Anderson - From the air
  30. Santana feat. Rob Thomas- Smooth
  31. White Stripes - Seven Nation Army
  32. Count Basie - Sing Sing (with a Swing)
  33. Pink Floyd - The Great Gig in the Sky
  34. Emerson, Lake and Palmer - Karn evil 9
  35. King Crimson - 21st century schizoid man
  36. The Doors - The End
  37. Led Zeppelin - Dazed and Confused
  38. Frank Zappa - Cruisin for Burgers (Zappa in New York)
  39. Colosseum - The Kettle
  40. Goldfrapp - Lovely Head
  41. Hallogallo - Neu!
  42. Genesis - The Knife
  43. Headhunters - Chamaeleon
  44. Justice - Genesis
  45. Dave Brubeck - Take Five
  46. Roxy Music - Re-Make/Re-Model
  47. John Coltrane - Afro-blue
  48. Peter Gabriel - The Feeling Begins <!--1. Bonnie M - Sonnie--!>
  49. Aimee Mann - One
  50. John Brarry - Theme from Midnight Cowboy
  51. Serge Gainsbourg - Le poinconneur des lilas
  52. Charles Aznavour - Formidable
  53. Mler Ife Dada - Sinto em mim
  54. Faust - No Harm
  55. Sun Ra - Space is the place
  56. Pharoah Sanders - You got to have Freedom
  57. Buraka Som Sistema - Kalemba
  58. Raul Seixas - Ouro de tolo
  59. John Zorn/Electric Masada - Karaim
  60. Fausto - Por este rio acima
  61. Scraping foetus off the wheel - Descent into the Inferno
  62. Can - Mother Sky
  63. Van der Graaf Generator - Lemmings
  64. Captain Beefheart - Electricity
  65. Zero Seven - In the Waiting line
  66. The Kinks - Sunday Afternoon
  67. Sanseverino - Comment seduire une femme marie
  68. Nancy Sinatra - You only live twice
  69. Soft Machine - Moon in June
  70. Charles Mingues - Better get hit in 'yo soul <!--1. Kraftwerk - Ruckzuk--!>
  71. Mahavishnu Orchestra - The inner mounting flame
  72. Morphine - Good
  73. Ellington, Mingus, Roach - Caravan
  74. Emir Kusturica - Unza Unza Time
  75. Gilberto Gil - Aquele Abraco
  76. Madredeus - O Pastor
  77. Bonnie Tyler - Total Eclipse of the Heart
  78. Addagietto, 7th Symphony, Beethoven, Karajan
  79. Madvillainy - Accordion <!---1. Britney Spears - Toxic---!>
  80. Nina simone - I get on without very well (except sometimes)
  81. Yoko Kanno and the Seatbelts - Tank!
  82. Seu Jorge - Life on Mars
  83. Baden Powell - Canto de Ossanha
  84. Zlabya - Harmonika Tulli
  85. Novos Baianos - Acabou Chorare
  86. La Femme d'argent - Air
  87. LCD Soundsystem - Us v Them
  88. Dj Shadow - Rocket Fuel
  89. Jungle by night - Attila
  90. Zef - Musique Mazurka
  91. Tim Maya - Bom Senso
  92. Duo Brotto Lopez - La Candela
  93. Cantiga da burra - Quadrilha
  94. Fela Kuti - Water no get enemy
  95. Tom Ze - Xique Xique
  96. Caetano Veloso - It's a long road
  97. My Bloody Valentine - Only Shallow <!--1. Cameo - Shake your pants--!>
  98. Joni Mitchel - Case of you
  99. Jacques Brel - Vesoul
